member.name: M:Mediachase.Cms.PageHelper.HasLanguageVersion(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines whether there is a language version exists for a specified page. It will return true, if user specified has a draft version already created. It will return false if version does not exist or if currently logged in user does not have access to the status'es page versions are in.
member.returns: true if [has language version] [the specified page id]; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Mediachase.Cms.PageHelper.HasLanguageVersion(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary:
Determines whether there is a language version exists for a specified page. It will return true, if user specified has a draft version already created. It will return false if version does not exist or if currently logged in user does not have access to the status'es page versions are in.
Specify version id to check if current user has access to that specific version.
member.returns: true if [has language version] [the specified page id]; otherwise, false.

member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, retrieves a object that represents the page at the specified URL.
member.param: A URL that identifies the page for which to retrieve a .
member.returns: A that represents the page identified by rawURL; otherwise, null, if no corresponding is found or if security trimming is enabled and the cannot be returned for the current user.

member.name: M:Mediachase.Cms.Providers.CmsSiteMapProvider.GetChildNodes(System.Web.SiteMapNode)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, retrieves the child nodes of a specific .
member.param: The for which to retrieve all child nodes.
member.returns: A read-only that contains the immediate child nodes of the specified ; otherwise, null or an empty collection, if no child nodes exist.

member.name: M:Mediachase.Cms.Providers.CmsSiteMapProvider.GetParentNode(System.Web.SiteMapNode)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, retrieves the parent node of a specific object.
member.param: The for which to retrieve the parent node.
member.returns: A that represents the parent of node; otherwise, null, if the has no parent or security trimming is enabled and the parent node is not accessible to the current user.

member.name: M:Mediachase.Cms.Providers.CmsSiteMapProvider.GetRootNodeCore
member.summary: When overidden in a derived class, retrieves the root node of all the nodes that are currently managed by the current provider.
member.returns: A that represents the root node of the set of nodes that the current provider manages.

member.name: M:Mediachase.Cms.Providers.CmsSiteMapProvider.GetRootNodeInternal
member.summary: Change the root name. This is kept private to prevent it from being externally called and impacting app performance. This functionality is exposed by changing the name of the root menu name

member.name: P:Mediachase.Cms.Providers.CmsSiteMapProvider.ActiveTopLevelMenuId
member.summary: MenuId associated with the active menu

member.name: P:Mediachase.Cms.Providers.CmsSiteMapProvider.ActiveTopLevelMenuName
member.summary: Setting this property allows the top-level menu to be used to be configured; if its not configured, then the first top-level menu in the database is used when creating the datasource

member.name: P:Mediachase.Cms.Providers.CmsSiteMapProvider.RootNode
member.summary: Gets the root object of the site map data that the current provider represents. Uses the ActiveTopLevelMenuName to determine which top-level menu to use
member.returns: The root of the current site map data provider. The default implementation performs security trimming on the returned node.
